name: Jumpar.io
description:
PARKOUR • FIGHT • GROW • HANG OUT

Jumpar.io is a fast paced game where YOU decide how to play!

Parkour through different challenges to find secret areas!

Meet new people and make friends!

Fight enemies and jump on them to pop them!

Find and pop bubbles to grow larger!

CONTROLS

Jump on other players to pop them! Be sure you jump from high enough or they won't pop!

Move with A and D.

Jump with W.

Go down into water with S.

Jump while on a wall to wall jump!

SECRETS

Parkour your way into secret areas!

Can you find them all?

CHALLENGES

Sorry, the challenge mode doesn't work on itch.io! Please visit https://jumpar.io/ to try it out.
